name: D-Day Gunner
description:
It is D-Day, June 6th, 1944 and WW2 continues as Allied forces prepare to storm the beaches of Normandy. As a German WW2 bunker gunner you are to shoot as many Allied troops and units you can before they over run your bunker. Shoot landing craft, planes, tanks and troops. See how long you can hold out and score as many points as possible. See in game instructions for more info. 

FEATURES:

• Simple but challenging gameplay!
• Gamepad or mouse support
• Automatic gun which will overheat and require cool down it fired too long
• Realistic smoke and gun fire effects
• Non-scripted levels ensure no two games are the same
• Steady, exciting flow of shooting action!

Support: This game has been tested on multiple devices. We strive to create trouble free software, if in the unfortunate event you do experience problems send us an email so we can fix it. Alternately you can visit us at http://www.newhopegames.com/ Thanks!
